metadata.description: Full-syntax web commands extracted from preservation plan Phase 2C.1c

commands.name: WordPress Version Detection via Feed
commands.description: Detect WordPress version by parsing RSS feed generator tag

flag_explanations.| grep generator: Filter for generator meta tag containing version

commands.notes: RSS feed at /feed/ contains <generator> tag with WordPress version. Example: <generator>https://wordpress.org/?v=5.8.1</generator>. More comprehensive: wpscan --url <URL> --enumerate vp,vt,u
